## R Package

This repository contains a R Package.
It provides R Shiny module UI/Server functions to build Python connector from your app.

## Package Installation

1. Devtools

In order to publish on Shinyapp.io, it's needed to install this package using devtools::install_github()
Install and load devtools package:

```{r cars}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
```

2. Install package

In most cases, you just use install_github("author/package").
For example, with myPackage package, which exists at github.com/myaccount/myPackage, youâ€™d type:

```{r cars}
install_github("myaccount/myPackage")
```
